info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:30PM EDT until September 08 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ORANGE AND WESTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 329 PM EDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monroe to near West Point to Cold Spring, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. These severe storms will be near... Monroe and West Point around 335 PM EDT. Newburgh around 355 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
